title: Touching Helene: A Novel
description: Fresh out of college and twenty pounds lighter, Helene is ready to fall in love, take chances, and figure out what she wants from life. But working as a paralegal in a Washington DC law firm turns out to be more complicated than she anticipated. When faced with a corruption scandal in her own firm, Helene must decide who to trust, who to love, and when to rely on her own instincts. This delightful contemporary romance novel features the turning point of youth, when life is all about making mistakes and falling in love for all the wrong—and sometimes all the right—reasons.
author: C.K. Finn
